cross: Sarcochilus Kulnura Sweetie x Sarcochilus Kulnura Ripple

measurements.description: One hundred fifty-one flowers and 183 buds on 25 upright inflorescences up to 24cm length; plant diameter 43cm, height 28cm, grown in 16-cm black scotch pot; sepals and petals deep rose, lightly barred red basally; lip saccate, yellow, orange markings; pollen cap white; substance firm; texture crystalline; received CCM award 20225321.
